contentrichtext.text: '''Stanton''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} *[[Stanton (surname)]] *[[Stanton Magnetics]], designer and manufacturer of audio products *[[Stanton Warriors]], an UK-based breakbeat group *[[Stanton number]], a dimensionless number relating fluid heat transfer and thermal capacity. *{{USS|Stanton|DE-247}}, a World War II destroyer escort of the U.S. Navy == Places == === United
